name: TANK SOULS
description: A fun souls-like game in which you will kill your time in hundreds of dungeons, pumping your skills and knocking out randomly-generated things.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: i7 - 7500U Graphics: MX150 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
